titleStmt.title: An exhortation & caution to Friends concerning buying or keeping of Negroes
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

notesStmt.note: By George Keith. cf. Bibliographical essay by Wilberforce Eames in New York printing MDCXCIII ... by D.C. McMurtrie. Chicago, 1928, p. 27.
"Given forth by our monethly meeting in Philadelphia, the 13th day of the 8th moneth, 1693."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
